knimeNode.name: XLog2Table Converter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Convert an event log into Data Table in KNIME

fullDescription.intro: It converts the event log into DataTable which the chosen attributes for traces and events. In default, it requires the caseID and eventID.
fullDescription.option: Choose the trace attributes which will be recorded into table during the conversion. It requires the caseID is chosen in default.
Choose the event attributes which will be recorded into table during the conversion. It requires the eventID is chosen in default.

ports.outPort: The DataTable in KNIME converted from the event log
